DEMO_624_MSG_020:
̂I... lack the power neccessary to defeat Snapped-off. 
You're the only one who has what it takes...
DEMO_624_MSG_030: ̂I'm extremely thankful for all that you have sacrificed to get us here... it's been a long, difficult, and dangerous road.
DEMO_624_MSG_040:
̂Regardless of what happens... the only thing that matters in the end is that you are able to eliminate Snapped-off.
ā
DEMO_624_MSG_050:
̂Let's head out into the Silent Meadows... I'm fairly certain that the contamination has not reached those lands yet.
ā
DEMO_624_MSG_060:
̂Once outside, you should be able to use the Flight Signal and ride Empyrea to the Core.
ā
DEMO_624_MSG_070: ̂That's all that is left to do... this will be finally be it... The final battle to save our world...
